definition: segmented
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
temperate/moderate/restrained
neither haughty nor humble/neither overbearing nor servile/neither supercilious nor obsequious
according to reason/in principle
neither servile nor overbearing (idiom)/neither obsequious nor supercilious
everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy
orderly and logical (of writing)/luxuriant/flourishing/prosperous
sensible/reasonable/an obvious reason, truth or fact/to understand the reason or reasoning
lit. crooked and straight/fig. right and wrong, good and evil
arrangement/order/tidiness
where there's a start, there's a finish (idiom); to finish once one starts sth/to carry things through/I started, so I'll finish.
upright/regular/proper/correct
tranquil and even-tempered (idiom); calmly and without stress
can bow and submit, or can stand tall (idiom, from Book of Changes); ready to give and take/flexible
to handle affairs/to deal with
as for
nobleman/person of noble character
the four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
